TestInformation.Title: FEniCS Dolfinx
TestInformation.Description: Dolfinx from the FEniCS Project is a next-generation problem solving environment for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) with the finite element method (FEM). This test profile makes use of the Dolfinx performance-test.

TestProfile.SystemDependencies: pugixml.hpp, libpugixml.so, spdlog/common.h, basix/types.h, /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/ffcx/main.py, scotch/ptscotchf.h, petsc.h

Entry.Name: Elasticity
Entry.Value: --problem_type elasticity --scaling_type strong --ndofs 25000000 -log_view -ksp_view -ksp_type cg -ksp_rtol 1.0e-8 -pc_type gamg -pc_gamg_coarse_eq_limit 1000 -mg_levels_ksp_type chebyshev -mg_levels_pc_type jacobi -mg_levels_esteig_ksp_type cg -matptap_via scalable -options_left
